atk_abil: Normal Attack: Fires several dark matter blasts to attack multiple enemies.
Skill Attack: Charges towards enemies, inflicting powerful damage. Invincible while charging.
Special Ability 1: Raises the basic speed of game by 4%
Special Ability 2: Increases movement speed and attack range of undead units by 3%
Innervate: Reduces raid skill cool-time by 1%. (Innervate can be stacked, but cannot exceed 40%. Also applies when units are in Time Shop.)
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Fires several dark matter blasts to attack multiple enemies.
Skill Attack: Charges towards enemies, inflicting powerful damage. Invincible while charging.
Special Ability 1: Raises the basic speed of game by 8%
Special Ability 2: Increases movement speed and attack range of undead units by 6%
Innervate: Reduces raid skill cool-time by 3%. (Innervate can be stacked, but cannot exceed 40%. Also applies when units are in Time Shop.)

buffs.description: Reduces raid skill cool-time even if Incubus is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%, Max 40%).
buffs.name: Innervate
